sentences.en: As the sun sets over Tokyo, another case is about to reach its climax on a bridge across a spaghetti of railway lines.
sentences.cn: 当太阳在在东京落下时，在一座横跨意大利面条似的铁路线的桥上，另一事件正要到达它的巅峰。

sentences.en: Aymo had a basin of spaghetti with onions and tinned meat chopped up in it.
sentences.cn: 爱漠搞来了一盆子通心面,拌着洋葱和切碎的罐头肉.

sentences.en: Bill: I would like mashed potato and spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 比尔：我想要份土豆泥和意大利面条。

sentences.en: Bond spreads can go up, down, sideways or even resemble a bowl of spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 债券差价能上能下，能左能右，甚至与一碗意大利面条相似。

sentences.en: Captain McCluskey was eating the plate of veal and spaghetti that had arrived.
sentences.cn: 警官麦克罗斯基在专心地吃着刚端上来的那盘小牛肉细条实心面.

sentences.en: Comments: This prank was one of the first to ever to be pulled on television, and although it seems a little bit out there today, at the time spaghetti was considered a delicacy in the U. K.
sentences.cn: 点评： 瑞士面条大丰收是第一个上电视的恶作剧，尽管该主意在今天看来仍然有点不足为道，但当时恶作剧中的主角“面条”成为了英国饭桌上的精美食物。

sentences.en: Dawson: Suppose I tell them how you followed her to that studio in Chelsea and watched them cooking spaghetti and all that rubbish. Wouldn't that ring a bell?
sentences.cn: 道森：假设我告诉他们你怎样尾随她到了切尔西的工作室，看他们煮意大利面条，以及所有那些废话。那不会使他们有所警觉吗?。

sentences.en: For me, spaghetti bolognese is the ultimate comfort food.
sentences.cn: 意大利肉酱面是绝好的安慰食物。

sentences.en: He began to feed in the spaghetti, carefully separating the strands.
sentences.cn: 他开始放入意大利面，小心翼翼地将面一缕缕分开。

sentences.en: He's a dab hand at cooking spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 他是煮意大利面条的高手。

sentences.en: I think I will have the spaghetti and a vegetable salad.
sentences.cn: 我想要一份意粉和蔬菜色拉.

sentences.en: I'd like spaghetti and meat sauce with a romaine salad.
sentences.cn: 我要意大利通心粉、肉汁和莴苣色拉.

sentences.en: If you're very hungry a double helping of spaghetti should fit the bill!
sentences.cn: 要是很饿的话,吃两份意大利细面条就行了!

sentences.en: Is the spaghetti ready yet, Dad?
sentences.cn: 爸爸,意大利面好了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Nicholas ate a dish of spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉斯吃了一盘意大利面条。

sentences.en: OK , well, if you want a good grade, you're gonna Iook past the spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 很好, 如果你要高分, 你要试着不去想意大利面.

sentences.en: People served a spaghetti supper in the parish house.
sentences.cn: 人们在教堂交谊厅吃意大利面晚餐.

sentences.en: She ate three platefuls of spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 她吃了三盘意大利面条。

sentences.en: Standing in the next room, in the middle of what looked like piles of concrete spaghetti, I began to feel overpowered.
sentences.cn: 站在下一个房间里，在这一大堆看起来就像水泥做的意大利细面条中间，我真有点受不了了。

sentences.en: Susan: What kind of spaghetti sauce is this?
sentences.cn: 苏珊： 这是哪种意大利面条酱？

sentences.en: Thank you. Now we'd like to have some good Italian spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 谢谢, 我们现在想点一些意大利通心粉.

sentences.en: You do not sound very keen. I think you like spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 听口气你好像不太感兴趣. 我还以为你喜欢意大利面条.

trans.tran_cn: 意大利面条，[电]漆布绝缘管
trans.tran_en: a type of  pasta  in very long thin pieces, that is cooked in boiling water
